item.title: Need good programmer help for server
item.dc:creator: @onlmusha1 onlmusha1
item.description:
@onlmusha1 wrote:

ok heres my problem… i go to my source i open up client.java and im trying to add a command named ::lol just so i an find it fast
well heres my code please correct me…
}
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“lol”) && (playerRights >=0)) {
triggerTele(2758, 3502, 0);
}
the one above it is…
}
if(command.startsWith(“shops”) && (playerRights >=0)) {
triggerTele(3215, 3424, 0);
}
and it works just fine… if someone could please help me i compiled it and everything…

next problem!
shops making my own
config–>shops.cfg—>
shop = 46 Test Shop 2 2 223 999 9802 1
[ENDOFSHOPLIST]
should be ok
config—>autospawn.cfg
spawn = 592 2807 3344 0 0 0 0 0 2
[ENDOFSPAWNLIST]
should be ok…
client.java

if(NPCID == 545){
openTan();
}
if(NPCID == 592){
PutNPCCoords = true;
Wanneshop = 46
}
if(NPCID == 710){
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 5;
i think this is were i fucked up…
if can help please post reply…
